plot: A charismatic doctor's guilt over a freak bike accident that paralyzed his beloved sibling compels him to kidnap young women he dates and use their eggs to inject embryonic stem cells into his brother so that he may walk again.
title: Pluripotent
plot_es: A charismatic doctor's guilt over a freak bike accident that paralyzed his beloved sibling compels him to kidnap young women he dates and use their eggs to inject embryonic stem cells into his brother so that he may walk again.
plot_en: A charismatic doctor's guilt over a freak bike accident that paralyzed his beloved sibling compels him to kidnap young women he dates and use their eggs to inject embryonic stem cells into his brother so that he may walk again.
